hero-background.description: A beautifully set table at a catered event, with elegant decorations and lighting.

1.name: Classic Wedding Buffet
1.description: A luxurious buffet spread featuring roasted chicken, prime rib, seasonal vegetables, artisanal salads, and a selection of fine cheeses. Perfect for elegant wedding receptions.

2.name: Corporate Lunch Box
2.description: Gourmet individual lunch boxes with a sandwich or salad, side, and dessert. Options include turkey club, caprese salad, and more. Ideal for meetings and office events.

3.name: Elegant Appetizers Package
3.description: A curated selection of 8-10 hot and cold hors d'oeuvres, such as mini quiches, shrimp cocktails, and bruschetta. Great for cocktail parties and mixers.

4.name: Decadent Dessert Table
4.description: An impressive display of cakes, tarts, cookies, and pastries. Includes a chocolate fountain with assorted dipping items. A sweet ending to any event.

5.name: Birthday Party Spread
5.description: A fun and delicious menu with crowd-pleasers like sliders, mac & cheese bites, fruit platters, and a custom birthday cake. Customizable for all ages.

6.name: Vegan Delight Package
6.description: A fully plant-based menu that doesn't compromise on flavor. Featuring items like jackfruit tacos, quinoa salads, and avocado chocolate mousse. A hit with all guests.

7.name: Dinner Menu 3
7.description: Malai Jam Jam, Cashew Halwa, Tender Coconut Payasam, Drumstick Soup, Veg Vajra Meen Fry, Veg Prawn 65, Lollipop, Onion Raita, Potato Curry, Cashew Pakoda, Tender Coconut Idli, Veg Fish Curry, Coconut Chutney, Mini Uthappam, Naan, Paneer Butter Masala, Jackfruit Biryani, Sambar Rice, White Rice, Rasam, Appalam, Curd Rice, Pickle (Mango), Fried Chilli, Fruit Salad, Ice Cream, Water Bottle, Beeda.

1.name: The Johnson Family
1.quote: K.Y. Catering made our wedding day absolutely perfect. The food was spectacular, and the service was second to none. Our guests are still raving about the prime rib!

2.name: Sarah L., Event Coordinator
2.quote: I rely on K.Y. for all my corporate events. The lunch boxes are always fresh, delicious, and delivered on time. They make my job so much easier.

3.name: Mike & Emily
3.quote: The appetizer and dessert tables were the stars of our anniversary party. Everything looked and tasted incredible. Truly a five-star experience from start to finish.

4.name: David Chen
4.quote: We hired them for my dad's 70th birthday, and they were fantastic. The team was so professional and accommodating to our various dietary needs. Highly recommend!

5.name: Alpha Beta Corp
5.quote: The best catering service we have used for our annual company picnic. The food was fresh, creative, and beautifully presented. The staff was professional and friendly.
